actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Joint resolution to provide for acquisition by the Secretary of the Interior of a historical easement on the property of the Scott-Grant House in the Georgetown section of the District of Columbia to insure that such property is preserved in its present condition.

summary.text: Provides for acquisition by the Secretary of the Interior of a historical easement on the property of the Scott-Grant House at 3238 R St. N.W. in the Georgetown section of the District of Columbia to insure that such property is preserved in its present condition. States that such easement shall not create a duty in the owner or their successors in interest to permit the public or the United States to enter upon such property.

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for acquisition by the Secretary of the Interior of a historical easement on the property of the Scott-Grant House in the Georgetown section of the District of Columbia to insure that such property is preserved in its present condition.
